document.full_text: france's marion bartoli, serving superbly, reached her first wta final in two years with a 6-1 6-3 demolition of belgian yanina wickmayer at indian wells on friday.
document.title: bartoli sweeps past wickmayer into indian wells final
lines_and_colors: france's marion bartoli, serving superbly, reached her first wta final in two years with a 6-1 6-3 demolition of belgian yanina wickmayer at indian wells on friday.
